unnormalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVALS! The film festival circuit is buzzing!
normalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVALS! The film festival circuit is buzzing!

unnormalised: Word on the street is that after Cannes, all eyes are turning towards the upcoming Mumbai International Film Festival (MIFF). Apparently, some indie gems are already generating serious Oscar buzz, even this early!
normalised: Word on the street is that after Cannes, all eyes are turning towards the upcoming Mumbai International Film Festival (M I F F). Apparently, some indie gems are already generating serious Oscar buzz, even this early!

unnormalised: And it's not just Mumbai; smaller fests like the Kerala Film Festival are becoming powerhouses for discovering new talent. Think more quirky storytelling, less Bollywood masala.
normalised: And it's not just Mumbai; smaller fests like the Kerala Film Festival are becoming powerhouses for discovering new talent. Think more quirky storytelling, less Bollywood masala.

unnormalised: Heard whispers of a Malayalam film titled "Neelakasham Pachakadal Chuvanna Bhoomi 2.0" premiering somewhere this fall. Could be a sleeper hit!
normalised: Heard whispers of a Malayalam film titled "Neelakasham Pachakadal Chuvanna Bhoomi two point zero" premiering somewhere this fall. Could be a sleeper hit!

unnormalised: Plus, festival season means prime networking – directors grabbing coffee (filter coffee, obviously!) with producers, deals being sealed over plates of spicy biryani. Forget LinkedIn, film fests are *the* place to be seen.
normalised: Plus, festival season means prime networking – directors grabbing coffee (filter coffee, obviously!) with producers, deals being sealed over plates of spicy biryani. Forget LinkedIn, film fests are *the* place to be seen.

unnormalised: Rumors are flying that Karan Johar himself might be making an appearance at a lesser-known Delhi festival this year to scout fresh faces.
normalised: Rumors are flying that Karan Johar himself might be making an appearance at a lesser-known Delhi festival this year to scout fresh faces.

unnormalised: So, grab your popcorn (and maybe a samosa), folks! Film festival season promises a whole lotta entertainment, surprises, and hopefully, some truly unforgettable cinema. Get ready for a cinematic Onam feast!
normalised: So, grab your popcorn (and maybe a samosa), folks! Film festival season promises a whole lotta entertainment, surprises, and hopefully, some truly unforgettable cinema. Get ready for a cinematic Onam feast!
